short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pop up, click, and score! Become a top pup hunter in this addictive and adorable casual game, Pup Hunt!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Welcome to Pup Hunt, the must-have Chrome extension that adds a delightful twist to your browsing experience! As you surf the web, adorable pups will unexpectedly appear on your screen. Quick reflexes are key as you click on these furry friends to score points and brighten your day. With its charming visuals, addictive gameplay, and seamless integration into your browsing routine, Pup Hunt offers endless moments of joy and relaxation. Install now and let the cuteness take over your browser â€“ perfect for dog lovers, casual gamers, and anyone in need of a playful break!"
